definition: drawing (manufacturing process in which hot metal or glass is stretched)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: B. For hard and half hard drawn tubes the ratio of outer diameter to wall thickness is no more than 25.
sentences.chinese: 硬态和半硬态拉制管外径与壁厚之比不小于25者。

sentences.english: It is also suitable for the light-duty wire and tube drawing and other general application.
sentences.chinese: 还可使用在管和线的拉制及其他一般用途。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method and device for drawing cone shaped optical fiber.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是一种拉制光纤光锥的方法及设备。

sentences.english: A. For annealed drawn tubes the ratio of outer diameter to thickness is no more than 15.
sentences.chinese: 退火态拉制管外径与壁厚之比不小于15者。

sentences.english: The effects of high drawing speeds on parameters of holey fibers are presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了高拉制速度对有孔光纤参数的影响。

sentences.english: Victimization of property bullying is positively correlated with average external control.
sentences.chinese: 受财产欺负与外部拉制有正相关。

sentences.english: The drawing of single crystal silicon in a closed thermal system is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍采用密闭热系统拉晶工艺拉制硅单晶的情况。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a metal wire drawing winding drum.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种用于拉制金属丝机械的卷筒。

definition: to wind/to coil/to spool/to loop around/winding
to let the dough rest (after mixing it)
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to let the dough rest (after mixing it)
milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
blank (for a coin etc)/breed or strain
